articles.title: Prince Harry willing to return to royal duties if asked amid King Charles’ cancer diagnosis: report - New York Post
articles.description: “I love my family,” the estranged Duke of Sussex told “Good Morning America” on Friday.
articles.content:
Prince Harry would reportedly consider mending the royal rift and returning to his royal duties if King Charles, 75, asked him to amid the monarch’s cancer diagnosis.
